result.eng: Whatever my reason for it was...
result.ga: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.orig: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.html: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...
result.ponchtml: Cibé cén t-údar a ḃí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: Is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ga: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.orig: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.html: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃail sin an seaċtú haiṫne agat is déan a ṁór nó a ḃeag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
